tokens.name: Karpathy / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:
**Rationale:**  
- **BUY/SELL PRESSURE:** Ratio of 1.2 (balanced) with strong recent buying (181 buys vs. 119 sells) and stable flow momentum.  
- **LIMIT ORDER:** Strong buying pressure overrides high volatility (78.3% price change), so 0% (market order).  
- **TAKE PROFIT:** Medium volume ($59k) → +10% to +20% (midpoint at +15%).  
- **STOP LOSS:** Medium volume → -8% to -15% (midpoint at -10%).  
- **TIME FRAME:** High volatility (78.3% price change) → 30min to 2h (short-term).  
- **Decision:** Aggressive BUY due to strong buying pressure and balanced ratio, with tight parameters to capitalize on momentum.
